name: Luka
story: The boxing champion in Belobog's Underworld, and one of Wildfire's most capable fighters.The consecutive reigning champion of the Fight Club, whose enthusiasm inspires children of the Underworld to dream big.

skills.name: Direct Punch
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Lacerating Fist
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy, with a high chance of causing Bleed.

skills.name: Coup de Grâce
skills.description: Receives #5[i] stack(s) of Fighting Will, with a high chance of increasing the target's DMG received, and deals massive Physical DMG to the target.

skills.name: Flying Sparks
skills.description: After using the Basic ATK "Direct Punch" or the Skill "Lacerating Fist," receives 1 stack of Fighting Will. When 2 or more stacks of Fighting Will are present, Basic ATK becomes Enhanced.If the enemy is Bleeding, the Enhanced Basic ATK will cause Bleed to deal extra DMG for 1 time.

skills.name: Anticipator
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor Physical DMG to a random single enemy, with a high chance to inflict Bleed to the target. Then, gains 1 stack of Fighting Will.

skills.name: Sky-Shatter Fist
skills.description: Consumes 2 stacks of Fighting Will to deal Physical DMG to a single enemy.

eidolons.name: Fighting Endlessly
eidolons.description: When Luka takes action, if the target enemy is Bleeding, increases DMG dealt by Luka by 15% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: The Enemy is Weak, I am Strong
eidolons.description: If the Skill hits an enemy target with Physical Weakness, gain 1 stack(s) of Fighting Will.

eidolons.name: Born for the Ring
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Never Turning Back
eidolons.description: For every stack of Fighting Will obtained, increases ATK by 5%, stacking up to 4 time(s).

eidolons.name: The Spirit of Wildfire
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: A Champion's Applause
eidolons.description: After the Enhanced Basic ATK's "Rising Uppercut" hits a Bleeding enemy target, the Bleed status will immediately deal DMG 1 time equal to 8% of the original DMG for every hit of Direct Punch already unleashed during the current Enhanced Basic ATK.
